website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable and casual skates with lots of room in the toe box.
pros: Plenty of extra room in the toe area, which will make those who don’t like their toes being scrunched into figure skates happy
cons: Some find the overall fit too tight
Pre-sharpened blades may need resharpening before first skate
Traditional laces aren’t everybody’s cup of tea

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 12.5 as my typical should size is 13. They fit perfect and work great. They did not arrive sharp but I did expect that. I would recommend for any one looking for great support and occasional skating.
customer_reviews.author: RSD

customer_reviews.title: Don't size down.  Very comfy / soft boot...
customer_reviews.text: A bit small for a size 10 shoe...but maybe that is how it is supposed to fit? Very comfy, a bit too comfy maybe? Very soft / cushy. Sharp enough out of the box. I tried a size 9 due to recommendations on the interwebs or even this listing about how to size skates, went back for a 10 in the end. I wear a 10 in everything else.
customer_reviews.author: joel

customer_reviews.title: So much nicer than rentals
customer_reviews.text: They 12s fit perfectly to my actual shoe size (actually I wear Men's shoe 11.5 or 12 depending on the brand, so I would error on a .5 size up). The soft center boot is a so nice, there was no pinching in on the tops of my feet like hard boots, and the ankle locks held my foot stable without any pressing or rubbing like traditional hockey skates. My only thing I could complain about is that I'd like a little more arch support... but now I'm getting into sneaker level complaints... For a boot sport like skating... these are an absolute dream.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Baynard

customer_reviews.title: Best Beginner Skates for adults
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly out of the box. I have a large bunion on my left foot so finding a good fit is hard, especially on the internet, but these fit like sneakers! So comfortable! Great for starting out! They are not fully sharpened, but sharp enough that you can finish the job yourself with a hand hone and some patience.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzyduck

customer_reviews.title: Comfort on Ice
customer_reviews.text: I have worn alot of inline skates and a fair number of Ice skates, The K2 softboot is easily the most comfortable, and the blades line up very close to my natural stride(less ankle twisting). Get them sharpened to your liking and enjoy the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Kata

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic skates
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic skates. I'm a size 12.5-13 shoe and I ordered a size 12 in these and they are a perfect fit. They are all black with a dark blue "K2" symbol. They fit great, tighten up great, feel great, and most importantly skate great.
customer_reviews.author: stevie

customer_reviews.title: So pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size up after reading the reviews of it being snug. Fit my son like a glove! He loves them! They provide good support.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great value, solid and nice looking skates
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old son loves them. Says they are very supportive. Were his first pair of skates ever and now he skates constantly. He is extremely happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Trujillo-Tiroch

customer_reviews.title: Great quality as always with K2!
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet but fit is true to size, same size and fit as my K2 inline skates. Great quality as always with K2!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best skates ever! I’m done with the stiff hockey skates. These are perfectly comfortable and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: David j nowicki jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and great closure system
customer_reviews.text: On my way back to Canada in a few days and needed new ice skates quick. So I haven't been on the ice yet but wanted to say that I ordered my shoe size 10, and they fit perfectly. The support seems very good. They feel like my inline skates. Best of all, I love the closure system, again just like my inline skates. No fooling around with laces with cold fingers, a major plus. With blade protectors I've been walking around the house to fit them in. My initial impression is that these are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: ArrowcatcherTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: ... only say these do the job and I skate better with them
customer_reviews.text: Not an expert skater so I can only say these do the job and I skate better with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: I've skated in them a number of times now and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Caboose

customer_reviews.title: Just a great comfortable skate
customer_reviews.text: Classic K2 comfort. Skates come pre-sharpend. Just a great comfortable skate.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I like so much. I love the design and color!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Comfy boot but order 1-2 sizes up
customer_reviews.text: I thought I purchased the correct size after reading the reviews. I wear a women’s size 7 wide. I ordered the 6.5 (men’s) size. I tried on the skates and my toe hit the top of the toe bed. Sadness, beacuse the soft boot was so nice & comfy. I was tempted to keep this size since the next size up was not available. Took 2 stars off b/c of the sizing issue. I ended-up purchasing a more expensive K2 ice skate in the bigger size. I hope it will fit better!
customer_reviews.author: Schul Vedelmeyer

customer_reviews.title: My picky son loves them i'd day they are great.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son – he loves them. This is our second pair of K2 skates. My second son has  and loves the as well. FYI they only do recreational skating - here and there on the public ice arena.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Skates!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and steady. They adjust firmly to your ankles and provide more balance. It took long to get them but staff were very generous and kind.
customer_reviews.author: EmE Creative LaB

customer_reviews.title: They are tight
customer_reviews.text: And not like "tight skates, yo", but "damn, these skates are killing my feet" kinda tight. They don't fit well as other skates I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Sameer A.

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for big feet
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, as a young man with a size 13 foot, I was slightly skeptical of brand new skates for 80$ in my size. Fortunately, these skates had two 14's left in stock for me and my brother who also has size 13 feet. These skates are extremely comfortable and fit very well. They are a little big but adjust perfectly for our feet. Overall great product and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: awesome

customer_reviews.title: these feel like heaven. Awesome affordable option for recreational
customer_reviews.text: After using the rented skates, these feel like heaven. Awesome affordable option for recreational skaters
customer_reviews.author: P. Singh

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Present This Year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates for my granddaughter. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Deighton

customer_reviews.title: Run a little small
customer_reviews.text: Skates were too small and then the next size up was out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It seems we delivered an old skates. It looks ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems we delivered an old skates. It looks they were used by someone before sent to us. Also the package was its original package not covered in a security box over it.
customer_reviews.author: Good customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Rollerbladers
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy to tighten. Great option especially for Rollerbladers as they feel very much like rollerblades. THEY DON'T COME IN THAT COLOR THOUGH THEY COME BLACK AND White
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: K2 Skate F.I.T. ICE Skate
feature_bullets: K2 soft boot delivers comfort and performance
Stability Plus cuff for maximum support
Water-repellent material to keep feet Warm and Dry
Easy to maintain stainless steal blade
